item.title: Formative Assessment
item.description:
Research Assistant

• Consortium for Policy Research in Education | Philadelphia, PA
• Conduct descriptive and impact analyses (multi-level models) on student math achievement data

item.title: Teacher Pathways
item.description:
Voluntary Research Internship

• University of Pennsylvania | Philadelphia, PA
• Established a text database of teacher licensure by proofreading sub-committee meeting transcripts

item.title: Undergraduate Retention
item.description:
Master’s Research Practicum

• University of Pennsylvania | Philadelphia, PA
• Cleaned data in R and analyzed the effectiveness of a program using Propensity Score Matching
• Responded to clients’ inquiry requests through a report of dropout identification and prevention

item.title: Intercultural Communication
item.description:
Undergraduate Thesis

• Beijing Normal University | Beijing, China
• Conducted interviews with 10 undergraduates and formulated a thesis with a rating of “Excellent”

item.title: Teacher Training Evaluation
item.description:
Research Assistant

• Moonshot Academy | Beijing, China • Designed and implemented questionnaires, interviews, and class observations for teachers

item.title: Student-led Research
item.description:
Student Research Project

• Beijing Normal University | Beijing, China
• Designed and implemented student surveys (Size: 160) and interviews (Size: 28)
• Compiled a 200-page report describing types of student research programs and students’ feedback
• Published by Faculty of Education (The group of all education departments) as a work summary

item.title: Student Assessment Comparative Study
item.description:
Student Research Project

• Beijing Normal University | Beijing, China
• Conducted a literature review about high school student assessment in U.S., U.K., and Japan
• Presented the findings and recommendations for China through a student panel presentation

item.title: Teacher Professional Development
item.description:
Summer Student Practicum

• Beijing Normal University | Beijing, China
• Designed and conducted teacher surveys (Size: 95) and interviews (Size: 10) within a school
• Analyzed the effectiveness of teacher training in the report based on survey and interview results
• Attained second place in BNU students’ research award and third place in BNU Jingshi Essay Cup

item.title: Classroom Interaction Observation
item.description:
Final project of Educational Psychology

• Beijing Normal University | Beijing, China
• Applied Flanders Interaction Analysis to analyze the teacher-student communication in a real class
